response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's worth more than $120 to you, right? Considering its true value and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to own this product at a price that reflects its worth while also securing a great deal for yourself. I believe you won't find a better offer elsewhere. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 140}
